plot: A documentary explaining the methods of movement and function in such animals as sea lions, rabbits, kangaroos, and cranes, using techniques of slow-motion and stop-motion photography.
title: How Some Animals Behave
plot_es: A documentary explaining the methods of movement and function in such animals as sea lions, rabbits, kangaroos, and cranes, using techniques of slow-motion and stop-motion photography.
plot_en: A documentary explaining the methods of movement and function in such animals as sea lions, rabbits, kangaroos, and cranes, using techniques of slow-motion and stop-motion photography.
